game.name: Elin
game.genres: Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Successor to the roguelike RPG "Elona". Adventure, survival, crafting, home-building, myths passed down, and stories of humans and Elea spun. What scars will you leave on the land of Ylva?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Successor to the roguelike RPG "Elona". Adventure, survival, crafting, home-building, myths passed down, and stories of humans and Elea spun. What scars will you leave on the land of Ylva?

reviewHighlights.text: The first 10 hours of this game you are going to feel so lost but keep finding more things to do. Same with the second 10 hours, and third 10 hours. I...
A great mixture of genres of rogue-like, town management, farming sim and RPG. Elin also feels quite complete despite being in Early Access and it is...
